page.title: 17SW BASINGSTOKE: COMMUNICAT/N
page.content: In this area there are 3 post offices. We can communicate by sending letters and postcards. There is 1 post office in Cliddesden, 1 at Brighton Hill and 1 at Kempshott. There are 2 CB radios in Cliddesden that we know of and many at Brighton Hill and Kempshott. There are several amateur radios in Kempshott and Brighton Hill but there are none in Cliddesden. There is one telephone box in Cliddesden by the pond, there are several in Brighton hill and Kempshott but we do not know how many. In this area there are lots of different papers and magazines. Here is a list of some of them: Cliddesden Newsletter, Basingstoke Gazette, Standard and the Hill and Dale. Also some companies have their own papers e.g. Parkers (Estate Agents)
